Articles.Content:
Trying to make landing flaps, using mirror placement. 

I did assing their deployment to button 1 at action groups.

Now other flap goes up and other down when i deploy them so plane starts rolling instead of pitching. They are mirrored so if i switch deploy direction plane just rolls other direction .

Had this happen sometimes too.

The workaround I found  for this at the moment seems to be reverting the launch, then the control surfaces seem to behave normally.
I had this too. Did not find a workaround, reverts or reloads or even swapping out the parts did not help.
